title: Shi Nansun honoured at Pingyao Film Festival
text:
23 Oct– Hong Kong producer Shi Nansun was recently honoured at the Pingyao International Film Festival (PYIFF).

As reported on Wenweipo, the producer, who was awarded the 'International Contribution to Chinese Cinema Award' at the event, expressed her gratitude for the recognition, saying, "I hope to continue promote Chinese films and help people learn more about China through our movies, thus enhance mutual understanding between different cultures."

Artistic Director and co-founder of the PYIFF, Marco Muller stated that the festival decided to honour Shi this year due to her important contributions in promoting Chinese films.

Aside from accepting the award, Shi, who has produced a number of films throughout the year including "The Thousand Faces of Dunjia" and "Journey to the West: The Demons Strike Back", also participated in an academic forum held as part of the festival to share her experience in producing films.

(Photo Source: WenWeiPo)
description: The Hong Kong producer was awarded for her contribution to Chinese cinema
